sources.title: Noon Wine (TV-1966) SAM PECKINPAH
sources.description:
UCLA Film Archive RESTORED Edition
ABC Stage 67, Season 1 Episode 10,
Director/Screenwriter: Sam Peckinpah
Stars: Jason Robards, Olivia de Havilland, L.Q. Jones

A rough dairy farmer is trapped in a loveless marriage and tries to make amends for a past mistake.

Trivia: nominated by the Writers Guild for Best Television Adaptation and the Directors Guild of America for Best Television Direction
